name: Forge and Fight
description:
For some reason the world ended. How doesn’t really matter, the important part is that you got all these ridiculous parts to put on your weapon. Instead of focusing on stuff like survival and whatever (like you’d normally do after the apocalypse) it’s all about forging the wildest creations and showing them off in the arena.

Experiment with tons of crazy builds and fight other players in physics based combat. Earn more parts as you play so you can forge even wilder weapons. Oh, and heads up, the arenas you’ll be fighting in hasn’t exactly passed any health and safety inspection.

Features

  • Sharp, flaming, shocking, poisonous or otherwise really dangerous weapon parts
  • Fight in online multiplayer
  • Find more weird parts as you play
